title: The Dow Rose 182 Points Because Trump and Xi Can Climb Down to Go Forward on Trade
text: The Pendulum Swings. All three main U.S. stock indexes rebounded from Tuesday’s losses, helped by reports that China is ready with offers to de-escalate the trade fight with the U.S. Still, the two countries are facing many unsolved problems. Turkish stocks continue to tumble after the country launched a military operation in Syria to seize territories held by U.S.-backed Kurdish forces—after the U.S. troops withdrew. AT&T (ticker: T) is selling its Puerto Rico business in an effort to pay down its debt. American Airlines Group (AAL) delayed the return of its Boeing 737 MAX fleet until at least January next year....
description: All three main U.S. stock indexes rebounded from Tuesday’s losses, helped by reports that China is ready with offers to de-escalate the trade fight with the U.S.
